scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:driver" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:user && npm run build:driver && npm run build:admin
scripts.ios:user: cd user-app && npx cap run ios
scripts.ios:driver: cd driver-app && npx cap run ios
scripts.ios:admin: cd admin-app && npx cap run ios
scripts.android:user: cd user-app && npx cap run android
scripts.android:driver: cd driver-app && npx cap run android
scripts.android:admin: cd admin-app && npx cap run android
scripts.sync:all: npm run sync:user && npm run sync:driver && npm run sync:admin
